query:
-- Zeige alle Topics für Course 2
SELECT id, title, courseId FROM topics WHERE courseId = 2 ORDER BY id;

-- Finde Progress für User testyou@me.com in Course 2
SELECT 
  qp.question_id,
  qp.first_attempt_status,
  qp.last_attempt_correct,
  qp.attempt_count,
  q.topic_id,
  t.title as topic_title
FROM question_progress qp
JOIN questions q ON qp.question_id = q.id
JOIN topics t ON q.topic_id = t.id
WHERE qp.user_id = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'testyou@me.com')
  AND t.courseId = 2
ORDER BY q.topic_id, q.id;
